item.description:
Hi All,

Cuchi Cuchi is one of Cambridge's best Tapas Bar! The last time we did this it was a blast!

Time:

7:00PM

At:

Cuchi Cuchi
www.cuchicuchi.cc

Neighborhood: Kendall Square/MIT
795 Main St
Cambridge, MA 02139
(617) 864-2929

Here's what people are saying.... "Wow! I had so much fun having dinner at Cuchi Cuchi. The "small plate" thing is a blast, the bar is unbelievable, and the atmosphere is amazing."

It's a great place and the food outstanding. Hope to see you there....

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Small plate Tapas @ Cuchi Cuchi- One of the city's Trendiest Tapas Bar
